snippet: Campaigns against utility rate increases, sometimes directed by AARP, can take different forms, employing creativity and legal action.
abstract: Older Americans are pushing back against proposed rate increases from utility companies, especially those they see as a result of company mismanagement or greed; campaigns, sometimes directed by AARP, can take different forms, employing creativity and legal action.
lead_paragraph: Campaigns against utility rate increases, sometimes directed by AARP, can take different forms, employing creativity and legal action.

headline.main: Shaking Pennies and Fists Against Utility Rate Increases
headline.print_headline: Shaking Pennies and Fists Against Utility Rate Increases
